error.unique: item with this {{field}} value already existed
error.latLongRequired: {{field}} place latitude and longitude is required
error.distanceZero: you can't create trip because KM between 2 points is 0
error.startError: you can't create any trip before request start
error.notPaidCreate: you can't create any trip before request paid successfully
error.notPaidChangeStatus: you can't take this before payment success
error.notHaveEnoughPoints: you don't have enough points you have {{leftPoints}} Points but trip need {{consumptionPoints}} Points because your trip KM is {{consumptionKM}} and one KM equal {{oneKMPoints}} Points but you can recharge your points
error.haveActiveTrips: you can't create any trip because you have {{activatedTrips}} {{type}} active
error.haveActiveTripsInRequest: you can't take this action because you have {{activatedTrips}} {{type}} active in this request
error.createPaymentError: you have an error when create payment order
error.getDistanceError: we find error when get distance
error.canNotTakeThisActionNow: you can't take this action now
error.tripVerifyCodeRequired: verify code that we sent it to client is required
error.settingAlreadyExisted: you have already create setting you can only update now
error.walletNotEnough: Wallet count is less than amount request
error.accountDeleted: your account is deleted please contact support to reactive it
error.changeAvailabilityError: you can't Change availability because you have requests in {{dates}}
error.fromDateMustLargerThanNow: from date must larger than now
error.toDateMustLargerThanFromDate: to date must larger than from date
error.atLeastOneDay: days must be at least one day
error.walletNotEnoughToCreateRequest: you don't have enough money in your wallet
